Quick search

Analysis¶

The analysis package uses the gromacs package and various other third party ones such as numpy and pylab. It provides a framework to analyze Gromacs MD simulations.

  • Analysis core modules
    • gromacs.analysis – Analysis Package Overview
    • analysis.core – Core classes for analysis of Gromacs trajectories
  • Support modules
    • analysis.collections – Handling of groups of simulation instances
  • Analysis plugins
    • Plugins
    • Helper modules
